name: The Gas House Gang
description: '''Gas House Gang''' was a [[barbershop quartet]] that won the 1993 [[SPEBSQSA]] International Quartet Competition. They started singing as a group in 1987 in St. Louis Missouri. After winning the 1988 Central States District Competition in their first attempt, they began a steady climb up the International Competition ladder which culminated in Calgary, Alberta, Canada, where they were awarded the 1993 International Quartet Championship.
